class SupportingData_object(BaseOEAModule):
    def __init__(self, source_folder='_SupportData', pseudonymize = True):
        BaseOEAModule.__init__(self, source_folder, pseudonymize)

        self.schemas['SchoolList'] = [
                                        ['SchoolId', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['School Name', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['Area', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['Location', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['Team', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['School Type', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['Boarding', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['SMYL', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['Last ICSEA', 'integer', 'no-op']                                                                 
                                        ]


    def ingest(self):
        oea.ingest_delta_data(self.source_folder, 'SchoolList', self.schemas['SchoolList'], None, 'SchoolId')


supportingdata_object = SupportingData_object()
